column4: Hey guys I'm a new Linux ubuntu user as of 3 days ago - got a question for whoever wants to answer it.
Does Linux have support from any companies or have any software developers created an open source personal finance managing software, like Quicken or Microsoft Money for Windows ?
Thats true - I read that article as well jcan_ras. You all are very friendly and ready to help all of the time.
same goes for kmymoney2--just looked it up in the repos, may or may not be good.
